Title: 10 Things I Hate About You
PosterImage: images/10 Things I Hate About You.jpg
Summary: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

Title: La La Land
Summary: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

Title: Whiplash
Summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory.

Title: The Intern
Summary: Seventy-year-old widower Ben Whittaker becomes a senior intern at an online fashion retailer.

Title: One Day
Summary: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation, Dexter and Emma are shown each year on the same date.

Title: Black Swan
Summary: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's 'Swan Lake'.

Title: Se7en
Summary: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: Gone Girl
Summary: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

Title: Mission Impossible Rogue Nation
Summary: Ethan Hunt and his team take on their most impossible mission yet: eradicating the Syndicate.

Title: War of the Worlds
Summary: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

Title: Minority Report
Summary: In a future where a special police unit can arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

Title: Notting Hill
Summary: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Summary: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s.

Title: The Incredibles
Summary: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Title: Ratatouille
Summary: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

Title: Cars
Summary: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

Title: Inside Out
Summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
PosterImage: images/Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.jpg
Summary: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic.

Title: A Monster in Paris
Summary: A 1910 Parisian delivery man and a cinema projectionist find a giant flea in a laboratory and try to protect it from a corrupt police chief.

Title: We Live in Time
Summary: A love story that spans decades, revealing how lives intertwine over time.

Title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
PosterImage: images/Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back.jpg
Summary: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

Title: Forrest Gump
Summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

Title: Alien
Summary: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Title: Inception
Summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Title: The Prestige
Summary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

Title: Titanic
Summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: Shutter Island
Summary: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

Title: Gangs of New York
Summary: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, who killed his father.

Title: Zodiac
Summary: In the late 1960s/early 1970s, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer.

Title: Panic Room
Summary: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

Title: The Social Network
Summary: The story of Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg and the creation of the social networking site that would become known as Facebook.

Title: Skyfall
Summary: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. As MI6 comes under attack, Bond must track down and destroy the threat.

Title: The Dark Knight
Summary: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Title: 500 Days of Summer
Summary: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe in true love and the young man who falls for her.

Title: Casino Royale
Summary: After earning his license to kill, James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, facing off against a mysterious banker to the world's terrorists.

Title: Spider Man 2
Summary: Peter Parker struggles to balance his crime-fighting duties as Spider-Man with the demands of his normal life.

Title: Interstellar
Summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: Taxi Driver
Summary: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuel his urge for violent action.

Title: Star Wars Episode III Revenge of the Sith
PosterImage: images/Star Wars Episode III Revenge of the Sith.jpg
Summary: Three years into the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan Kenobi pursues a new threat, while Anakin Skywalker acts as a double agent between the Jedi Council and Palpatine.

Title: Jurassic Park
Summary: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

Title: Catch Me If You Can
Summary: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking him down.
